name: Ibti Myrak
content:
Ibti Myrak was a female Vurk pilot who held the position of Rogue Five in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Rogue Squadron during the Galactic Civil War. A blue-skinned individual, Myrak flew an T-65B X-wing starfighter alongside other members of the squadron under Commander Luke Skywalker during an attack on Galactic Empire shipyards in the Taris system while still a new recruit. Myrak flew with R4-MS, an R4 astromech droid, she referred to as "Em-Ess." Later, during a search for a traitor responsible for setting a trap for the Rogues, Myrak fought with Mon Calamari Admiral Gial Ackbar on the deck of Ackbar's flagship, Home One.
Ibti Myrak appeared in the two-part "Squad Goals" story, which was published in the eleventh and twelfth issues of the 2020 comic book series Star Wars Adventures. Written by Cavan Scott and illustrated by Manuel Bracchi, the story was published on October 19 and November 24, 2021.
